summary: Completed comprehensive testing of IHL MUN 2026 website mobile responsiveness and functionality. Backend APIs fully functional, mobile navigation mostly working with one minor overlay issue.

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile navigation overlay doesn't close properly when clicking X button
ui_bugs.details: Menu opens correctly but overlay remains visible after clicking close button

passed_tests: Mobile committees page displays all committees
Secretariat members display correctly (14 members: Tair, Elina, Kamila, Maruf, Darya, etc.)
Registration form field validation and submission
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix mobile navigation overlay closing issue - the menu opens correctly but doesn't close properly when clicking the X button. The overlay remains visible after clicking close.
